definition: lit. whoever provides milk is your mother (idiom)/fig. to follow whoever is feeding you/to put one's loyalties where one's interests lie
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
breast/milk/to breastfeed
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
see 便宜|便宜[pian2 yi5]
is/are/am/yes/to be
mother/young lady/(coll.) effeminate

sentences.english: Whoever suckles me is my mother in China, very simple, you can have everything if you are rich.
sentences.chinese: 在中國有奶便是娘，非常簡單，有錢就可以擁有一切。

definition: to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
lit. see the wind and set the helm (idiom); fig. to act pragmatically/to be flexible and take advantage of the situation
thankless wretch/an ingrate
sb who goes whichever way the wind blows/sb with no mind of their own/easily swayed person/opportunist
to latch on to the rich and powerful
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
dog's leg/fig. one who follows a villain/henchman/hired thug
jackals of the same tribe (idiom); fig. They are all just as bad as each other.
lit. to acknowledge the bandit as one's father (idiom); fig. a complete betrayal/to sell oneself to the enemy
lit. If the upper beam is not straight, the lower beam will be crooked (idiom); fig. subordinates imitate their superiors' vices
pinyin: shang4 liang2 bu4 zheng4 xia4 liang2 wai1

definition: lit. to destroy the bridge after crossing the river (idiom)/fig. to abandon one's benefactor upon achieving one's goal
to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
